item.title: Quick howto for the Hugo site generator
item.description: This documents the various steps I took to make this blog. I use Slackware Linux, other systems may operate differently. Install Hugo There isn’t a recent build available specifically for Slackware, so I retrieved the generic AMD64 version and copied it to my ~/bin directory. Golang builds self contained executables so there are no dependencies to install. Create a site: hugo new site bitsandboots Install and configure a theme Install a theme
